description: Chickpea or gram flour makes these pizzas naturally gluten free and nutritious.
name: Socca Pizzas with Charred Greens Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the chickpea flour into a bowl with the mixed herbs and whisk to combine. Whisk in 250ml of cold water, cover with a tea towel and set aside for 1 hour.
Heat half the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Set aside.

Brush the zucchini and broccoli with the remaining oil and half the lemon juice and cook for 4 minutes in a smoking hot griddle pan, turning halfway through. Place the creme fraiche in a bowl, add the remaining lemon juice and zest, tip in the onion and garlic and mix through.

Pre-heat the grill to 180Â°C. Pour the rested batter into an oiled, large, ovenproof frying pan and swirl to coat. Cook for 2-3 minutes on medium heat, then carefully flip and cook for 2-3 more minutes until golden.
Place the pizza base on a baking sheet, spread with the creme fraiche mix and top with the grilled vegetables. Grill for 3-4 minutes. Top with rocket and a drizzle of oil and serve.
